Vardas turi būti nuo :min iki :max simbo: Name has to be between :min and :max characters long.
Pavardė turi būti nuo :min iki :max simb: Surname has to be between :min to :max characters long.
Telefono numeris turi būti sudarytas iš: Phone number has to be made up of numbers and shorter than :max characters.
El. paštas turi būti unikalus ir nuo :mi: Email has to be unique and between :min and :max characters long.
Adresas turi būti iki :max simbolių ilgi: Address has to be up to :max characters long.
Valstybinių numerių formatas turi būti:: License plate number format has to be: ABC123.
Markė turi būti nuo :min iki :max simbol: Make has to be between :min and :max characters long.
Modelis yra privalomas ir turi būti iki: Model is required and has to be up to :max characters long.
